directions: [["In a small sauce pan combine all sauce base ingredients. Heat over medium heat until sauce begins to boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove pan from heat and allow to cool for 8 minutes."],["Whisk all thickening mixture ingredients together. Slowly add mixture to the sauce base mixture, continually whisking to create an emulsion. Heat pan and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Once it boils, remove from heat."],["Cover sauce and chill or use immediately."],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
notes: Omit cayenne pepper for a slightly less spicy sauce.
